content.title: Introduction to Segment Templates
content.body:
Let’s get started!

In this guided tour, we will:

  • Create a Segment Row template
  • Add widgets to the template
  • Assign the template to the Segment widget
  • Use Inline editing to modify the template
  • Assign an action when the row of the segment is clicked

Before you begin, ensure that you have completed the hike:

  1. Introduction to Segment
. Ensure that you open the same project that you have created in the previous hike.
To open a closed project, from the main menu, navigate to Project > Open > HCL Reference Architecture > EmployeeList.


When you’re ready, click Start!
